text: The Sweet Escape is the second studio album by the American singer and songwriter Gwen Stefani, which was released on December 1, 2006 by Interscope Records. ==Track listing== ;Notes * signifies an additional producer * signifies a co-producer * signifies an additional vocal producer * "Wind It Up" contains interpolations from the composition "The Lonely Goatherd", written by Richard Rodgers and Oscar Hammerstein. ==Personnel== Credits adapted from the liner notes of The Sweet Escape. * Gwen Stefani – lead vocals * Akon – keyboards, production, programming, vocals * Andrew Alekel – recording * Angel Aponte – additional recording * Trinka Baggetta – A&R; coordination * Matt Beck – guitar * Yvan Bing – assistant engineering * Stephen Bradley – baritone, trumpet * Julian Chan – recording * Jolie Clemens – art direction, layout * Andrew Coleman – recording * Greg Collins – bass ; recording ; guitar ; additional vocal production ; additional vocals recording * Cindy Cooper – art and packaging coordination, photography * Pete Davis – additional keyboards, additional mix programming * Loren Dawson – keyboards * Alex Dromgoole – assistant engineering ; guitar ; bass * Bojan Dugic – recording * David Emery – assistant engineering ; guitar * Ron Fair – orchestra production * Jason Finkel – assistant engineering * Nicole Frantz – art and packaging coordination, photography * Brian "Big Bass" Gardner – mastering * Sean Garrett – backing vocals, co-production * Brian Garten – recording * Simon Gogerly – recording * Mark "Exit" Goodchild – recording * Scheila Gonzalez – clarinet, flute, saxophone * Martin Gore – guitar * Jill Greenberg – fine art concept, photography * Keith Gretlein – recording * Hart Gunther – assistant engineering * Richard Hawley – guitar * Nellee Hooper – production * Jimmy Iovine – A&R; direction * Neil Kanal – programming, recording ; keyboards * Tony Kanal – keyboards, production, programming * Ryan Kennedy – assistant engineering * Anthony LoGerfo – percussion * Aidan Love – programming * Tony Love – guitar * Gabrial McNair – keyboards ; baritone, trombone * Jonathan Merritt – recording * Kevin Mills – recording ; assistant engineering * Colin Mitchell – recording * Dror Mohar – assistant engineering * Angelo Moore – saxophone * The Neptunes – production * Ewan Pearson – programming * Pharrell – vocals * Glenn Pittman – assistant engineering * Mark Ralph – guitar * Tim Rice-Oxley – keyboards, piano * Kingston James McGregor Rossdale – baby sounds * Ian Rossiter – assistant engineering * Mark "Spike" Stent – mixing ; additional production * Swizz Beatz – production * Talent Bootcamp Kids – additional vocals * Phil Tan – mixing * Steve Tolle – assistant engineering * Rich Travali – mixing * Giorgio Tuinfort – co- production, keyboards, programming * Mark Williams – A&R;
